name: Baby Rick and the Mysterious Case of Separation Anxiety
name_original: Baby Rick and the Mysterious Case of Separation Anxiety
description:
A mother must find her way out of a weird maze by using her baby to activate platforms.

An FPS platformer puzzle game. In Baby Rick and the Mysterious Case of Separation Anxiety, you must carry around your baby but also let him on special pads for extended periods of time; but being separated to long has some nasty side effects.

Can you follow the motto: "Never Gonna Give You Up"?

Controls:

Using Keyboard and Mouse: standard controls

- E to interact

- Spacebar to jump and double jump

Controller:

A to Jump

X to interact

Done for the "Summer Game Jam for Kicks" using Unreal Engine 4.

By: Kevin Robinson, Stephanie Harmer, Martin Lein and Phillip Conte.

Sound and music are the only things not produced by the team. Using free use sounds as well as No Copyright Sounds for music.
